workflow.name: Multi-platform price finder: Scraping prices with Bright Data, Claude AI & Telegram
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

# üì¶ Multi-Platform Price Finder: Scraping Prices with Bright Data & Telegram

An intelligent n8n automation that fetches real-time product prices from marketplaces like Amazon, Wayfair, Lowe's, and more using Bright Data's dataset, and sends promotional messages via Telegram using AI‚Äîperfect for price tracking, deal alerts, and affiliate monetization.

---

## üìã Overview

This automation tracks product prices across top e-commerce platforms using Bright Data and sends out alerts via Telegram based on the best available deals. The workflow is designed for affiliate marketers, resellers, and deal-hunting platforms who want real-time competitive pricing.

---

## ‚ú® Key Features

- üîé **Multi-Platform Scraping**: Supports Amazon, Wayfair, Lowe's, and more
- ‚ö° **Bright Data Integration**: Access to structured product snapshots
- üì¢ **AI-Powered Alerts**: Generates Telegram-ready promo messages using AI
- üß† **Lowest Price Logic**: Filters and compares products across sources
- üìà **Data Merge & Processing**: Combines multiple sources into a single stream
- üîÑ **Keyword-Driven Search**: Searches using dynamic keywords from form input
- üì¶ **Scalable Design**: Built for multiple platform processing simultaneously
- üßº **Clean Output**: Strips unnecessary formatting before publishing

---

## üéØ What This Workflow Does

### **Input**
- **Search Keywords**: User-defined keyword(s) from a form trigger
- **Platform Sources**: Wayfair, Lowe's, Amazon, etc.
- **Bright Data API Key**: Needed for authenticated scraping

### **Processing Steps**
1. **User Input** via n8n form trigger (keyword-based)
2. **Bright Data API Trigger** for each marketplace
3. **Status Polling**: Wait until scraping snapshot is `ready`
4. **Data Retrieval**: Fetches JSON results from Bright Data snapshot
5. **Data Cleaning & Normalization**: Price, title, and URL are extracted
6. **Merging Products** from all platforms
7. **Find Lowest Price Product** using custom JS logic
8. **AI Prompt Generation** via Claude/Anthropic
9. **Telegram Formatting** and alert message creation

### **Output**
- üõçÔ∏è Product Title
- üí∞ Final Price
- üîó Product URL
- ‚úâÔ∏è Promotional Message (for Telegram/notifications)

---

## üöÄ Setup Instructions

### **Step 1: Import Workflow**
1. Open n8n > Workflows > **+ Add Workflow**
2. Import the provided JSON file

### **Step 2: Configure Bright Data**
- Add credentials under **Credentials ‚Üí Bright Data API**
- Set the appropriate `dataset_id` for each platform
- Ensure dataset includes `title`, `price`, and `url` fields

### **Step 3: Enable Keyword Trigger**
- Use the built-in `Form Trigger` node
- Input: Single keyword field (SearchHere)

### **Step 4: Telegram or AI Integration**
- Modify prompt node for your language or tone
- Add Telegram webhook or integration where needed

---

## üìñ Usage Guide

### Adding Keywords
- Trigger the form with a product keyword like `iPhone 15`
- Wait for workflow to fetch best deals and generate Telegram message

### Understanding AI-Powered Output
- AI creates a short, engaging message like:
  > "üî• Deal Alert: Get the iPhone 15 for just ‚Çπ74,999! Limited stock‚ÄîCheck it out: [link]"

### Debugging Output
- Output node shows cleaned JSON with `title`, `price`, `url`, and `message`
- If no valid results, debug message is returned with sample structure info

---

## üîß Customization Options

### Add More Marketplaces
- Clone any HTTP Request node (e.g., for Wayfair)
- Update `dataset_id` and required output fields

### Modify Price Logic
- Update the `Code1` node to change comparison (e.g., highest price instead of lowest)

### Change Message Format
- Edit the `AI Agent` prompt to customize tone/language
- Add emoji, CTAs, or markdown formatting as needed

---

## üß™ Test & Activation

- Add a few sample keywords via form trigger
- Run manually or set as a webhook for external app input
- Check final AI-generated message in output node

---

## üö® Troubleshooting

| Issue | Solution |
|-------|----------|
| **No Data Returned** | Ensure keyword matches real products |
| **Status Not 'Ready'** | Bright Data delay; add `Wait` nodes |
| **Invalid API Key** | Check Bright Data credentials |
| **AI Errors** | Adjust prompt or validate input fields |

---

## üìä Use Cases

- üí∞ **Affiliate Campaigns**: Show best deals across platforms
- üõí **Deal Pages**: Post live offers with product links
- üß† **Competitor Analysis**: Track cross-platform pricing
- üîî **Alert Bots**: Send real-time alerts to Telegram or Slack

---

## ‚úÖ Quick Setup Checklist

- [x] Bright Data API credentials configured
- [x] n8n form trigger enabled
- [x] Claude or AI model connected
- [x] All HTTP requests working
- [x] AI message formatting verified

---

## üåê Example Output

```json
{
  "title": "Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max",
  "price": 1199,
  "url": "https://amazon.com/iphone-15",
  "message": "üî• Grab the Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max for just $1199! Limited deal‚ÄîCheck it out: https://amazon.com/iphone-15"
}
```

---

## üì¨For any questions or support, please contact:

üìß <info@incrementors.com>

or fill out this form: [https://www.incrementors.com/contact-us/](https://www.incrementors.com/contact-us/)

workflow.name: Multi-Platform Price Finder: Scraping Prices with Bright Data & Telegram

parameters.content:
üîé Multi-Platform Product Price Scraper (Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Target, BestBuy, Home Depot)

In this section, the workflow performs keyword-based product scraping across multiple e-commerce platforms using Bright Data. Each row follows the same structure:

Trigger Bright Data scrape via API

Check progress until snapshot is ready

Retrieve structured product data

Update Google Sheet with URL, Title & Price

‚öôÔ∏è Platforms handled: Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Target, BestBuy, Home Depot
Combines all results from different platforms into one stream for further processing.
Scans all merged product data and identifies the product with the lowest price. Returns title, price, and URL with a formatted message.
Uses Anthropic Chat Model to write a short promotional message based on the lowest price product. Keeps the tone exciting and urgent.
Cleans Claude‚Äôs response: removes formatting like **bold**, fixes < >, and adds HTML line breaks.
Sends the promotional message (lowest price product) to your Telegram channel or contact.

Triggers Bright Data scraping for BestBuy
Fetches final scraped data from BestBuy snapshot
Triggers Bright Data scraping for Target
Fetches final scraped data from Target snapshot
Triggers Bright Data scraping for Home Depot
Checks scrape status for Home Depot
Fetches final scraped data from Target snapshot1

main.node: Fetches final scraped data from BestBuy snapshot
Fetches final scraped data from Target snapshot
Fetches final scraped data from Target snapshot1
Fetches final scraped data from Etsy snapshot
Fetches final scraped data from Amazon snapshot

Checks scrape status for Home Depot
Triggers Bright Data scraping for Amazon using keyword

Triggers Bright Data scraping for Home Depot
Checks scrape status for Home Depot
Checks scrape status for Amazon (status: ready)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
